title: Optimized post Gaussian approximation in the background field method
abstract: We have extended the variational perturbative theory based on the back ground field method to include the optimized expansion of Okopinska and the post Gaussian effective potential of Stansu and Stevenson. This new method provides much simpler way to compute the correction terms to the Gausssian effective action (or potential). We have also proposed a conceptually more appealing prescription for renormalization of the effective potential of the 4- dimensional scalar $\phi^4$ theory. Although this renormalization prescription leads to the same mathematical form for the renormalized effective potential as that of Stansu and Stevenson it does not involve the expansion parameter ($\epsilon$).
